logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates the Revenue to Accounts Receivable ratio and indicates the number of the receivables turnover for a particular level of sales and indicates the efficiency of working capital management

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AR Amount

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Cost of Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Avg Inventory Days
logicalColumns.description: This metric determines the ratio of inventory to cogs to measure the efficiency of the firm's inventory management (number of days of Inventory held). A higher ratio or days indicates that inventory does not remain in the warehouses or on the shelves but rather turns over rapidly from the time of acquisition to sale.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Inventories

logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates an organization's cash cycle by subtracting the Operating Cycle in days from the Average Payables in days.

logicalColumns.name: Days Cash in Hand
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Cash / Daily Minimum Operating Expenses  ; where Minimum Operating Expenses = (Total Operating Expenses - Depreciation)

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  / (%2 - %3)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash

logicalColumns.name: Days Sales Outstanding
logicalColumns.description: This metric determines the average number of days in accounts receivable to measure the effectiveness of the firm's credit policies and indicate the level of investment in receivables needed to maintain the firm's sales level.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AR Amount

logicalColumns.name: Days Payables Outstanding

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Cost of Revenue for the Period
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AP Amount

logicalColumns.name: Days Payables Outstanding - YTD Purchase

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AP Amount

logicalColumns.name: Fixed Assets Turnover
logicalColumns.description: The fixed assets turnover ratio measures the efficiency of fixed asset investment. The ratio reflects the level of sales generated by investments in productive capacity. Hence a higher turnover means that the company is more efficient.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 * 365 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net PPE
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Inventory Turnover
logicalColumns.description: This metric capture the Cost of Goods Sold to Inventories ratio to measure the efficiency of the firm's inventory management. A higher ratio indicates that inventory does not remain in the warehouses or on the shelves but rather turns over rapidly from the time of acquisition to sale.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 * 365 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Inventories
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Cost of Revenue

logicalColumns.name: LT Assets Turnover
logicalColumns.description: The long term assets turnover ratio measures the efficiency of long-term capital investment. The ratio reflects the level of sales generated by investments in productive capacity. Hence a higher turnover means that the company is more efficient.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 * 365 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Assets
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Operating Cycle
logicalColumns.description: The operating cycle of a merchandising firm is the sum of the number of days it takes to sell inventory and the number of days until the resultant receivables are converted to cash. A lower metric result means less working capital is needed and the is able to operate more efficiently.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Days Sales Outstanding - YTD Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Avg Inventory Days

logicalColumns.name: ROE (Pre-Interest)
logicalColumns.description: Annualized Pre-Interest Income / Stockholder's equity * 100; Where Pre-Interest Income = Net Income + Interest Expense

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: ( CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  +  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END ) * 365 / ( CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END  +  CASE  WHEN %4 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %4 END  +  CASE  WHEN %5 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %5 END ) * 100
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Net Income

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Equity

logicalColumns.name: ROA (Pre-Interest)
logicalColumns.description: Annualized Pre-Interest Income / Total Assets * 100

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: ( CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  +  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END ) * 365 / %3 * 100
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Net Income
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Interest Expense
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Assets

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Net Income
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Assets

logicalColumns.name: ROCE (Pre-Interest)
logicalColumns.description: Annualized Pre-Interest Income / Total Capital Employed * 100; Total Capital Employed = Common Stock + Preferred Stock + Other Equity + Retained Earnings + Long-Term Debt + Other Liabilities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: ( CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  +  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END ) * 365 / ( CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END  +  CASE  WHEN %4 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %4 END  +  CASE  WHEN %5 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %5 END  +  CASE  WHEN %6 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %6 END  +  CASE  WHEN %7 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %7 END  +  CASE  WHEN %8 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %8 END ) * 100
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Net Income
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Interest Expense
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Common Stock
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Debt
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Retained Earnings
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Preferred Stock
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Equity
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Liabilities

logicalColumns.name: ROCE (EBIT Basis)
logicalColumns.description: Annualized Earnings Before Interest and Taxes / Total Capital Employed * 100 ; Total Capital Employed = (Common Stock + Retained Earnings + Preferred Stock + Other Equity + Long-Term Debt + Other Liabilities)

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  * 365 / ( CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  +  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END  +  CASE  WHEN %4 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %4 END  +  CASE  WHEN %5 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %5 END  +  CASE  WHEN %6 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %6 END  +  CASE  WHEN %7 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %7 END ) * 100
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily EBIT
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Common Stock
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Debt
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Retained Earnings
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Preferred Stock
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Equity
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Liabilities

logicalColumns.name: ROE
logicalColumns.description: Annualized Net Income / (Common Stock + Retained Earnings + Other Equity) * 100

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  IFNULL(%1, 0) +  IFNULL(%2, 0) +  IFNULL(%3, 0) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %4 END  * 365 / ( IFNULL(%1, 0) +  IFNULL(%2, 0) +  IFNULL(%3, 0)) * 100
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Common Stock
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Retained Earnings
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Equity
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Net Income

logicalColumns.name: Total Assets Turnover
logicalColumns.description: The assets turnover ratio measures the efficiency of total current assets and long-term capital investment. The ratio reflects the level of sales generated by investments in productive capacity. Hence a higher turnover means that the company is more efficient.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 * 365 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Assets
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Working Capital Turnover
logicalColumns.description: This metric determine the ratio of revenue to Working Capital where working capital = current assets - current liabilities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 - %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 - %2 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %3 * 365 / (%1 - %2) END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Assets
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.internal - Daily Revenue

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: 'n/a'

logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Earning Before Interest, Tax, Depreciation and Amortization by computing Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Selling and Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R and D Expenditure + Other Income + Depreciation Expenses.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) -  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0) -  IFNULL(%4, 0) -  IFNULL(%5, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Sales & Marketing Expenses
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Operating Expenses

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AP Amount
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AR Amount

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) -  IFNULL(%2, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Cash Inputs to COGS %
logicalColumns.description: This metric measures cash inputs against cost of goods sold (COGS).

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash Inputs

logicalColumns.name: Cash Gross Margin %
logicalColumns.description: Cash Gross Margin / Cash Collections * 100; Cash Gross Margin = (Cash Collections - Cash Inputs); Where Cash Collections = Revenue - Change in Accounts Receivable Cash Inputs = Cost of Goods Sold + Change in Inventory - Change in Accounts Payable

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 - %2 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %3 / (%1 - %2) * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Accounts Receivable
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash Gross Margin

logicalColumns.name: Cash Gross Margin
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as: Cash Collections - Cash Inputs; Where Cash Collections = Revenue - Change in Accounts Receivable and Cash Inputs = Cost of Goods Sold + Change in Inventory - Change in Accounts Payable.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  -  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash Collections
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash Inputs

logicalColumns.name: Cash Collections
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as: Revenue - Change in Accounts Receivable

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) -  IFNULL(%2, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Accounts Receivable

logicalColumns.name: Cash Inputs
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as: Cost Of Goods Sold + Change in Inventory - Change in Accounts Payable

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) +  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Inventory
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Accounts Payable

logicalColumns.name: Cash Collections to Revenue %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as Cash Collections / Revenue * 100, where Cash Collections = Revenue - Change in Accounts Receivable.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash Collections

logicalColumns.name: Cash to Current Liabilities (CL)
logicalColumns.description: This metric provides the ratio of Cash to Current Liabilities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash

logicalColumns.name: Capex Ratio
logicalColumns.description: This metric is the ratio of operating cash flow to capital expenditure for the period. Since capital expenditure (CapEx) is not captured directly, the change between closing and opening balances of property, plant and equipment is taken as CapEx.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  OR %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in PPE
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Cash Flow

logicalColumns.name: Cost of Revenue to Revenue %
logicalColumns.description: This metric shows the proportion of cost of revenue to revenue.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Cost of Revenue to Revenue YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric shows the proportion of cost of revenue to revenue.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Current Ratio
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates the current assets to current liabilities ratio.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Assets

logicalColumns.name: Debt To Equity
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates the long-term debt to total equity ratio.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  OR %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Shareholders Funds
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Liabilities

logicalColumns.name: EBITDA Margin YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates EBITDA (YTD) / Revenue (YTD) * 100, Where EBITDA (YTD) = Revenue (YTD) - Cost of Revenue (YTD) - Selling and Marketing Costs (YTD) - Operating Expenses (YTD) - Research and Development Expenditure (YTD) + Other Income (YTD) + Depreciation Expenses (YTD).

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBT

logicalColumns.name: Financing Cash Flow
logicalColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Change in Short-term borrowings + Change in Long-term debt + Change in Other liabilities + Change in Preferred Stock + Change in Common Stock + Change in Other Equity capital.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) +  IFNULL(%2, 0) +  IFNULL(%3, 0) +  IFNULL(%4, 0) +  IFNULL(%5, 0) +  IFNULL(%6, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Preferred Stock
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Short Term Borrowing
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Common Stock
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Long Term Debt
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Liabilities
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Equity Capital

logicalColumns.name: Gearing Ratio
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates what percent of a firm's equity is comprised of long-term debt. Long Term Debt/(Long Term Debt + Retained Earnings + Common Stock).

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  +  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  +  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END  = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %1 / ( CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  +  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  +  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END ) END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Debt
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Retained Earnings
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Common Stock

logicalColumns.name: Gross Margin %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Gross Profit / Revenue * 100), where GROSS PROFIT = (Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold).

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Gross Profit

logicalColumns.name: Gross Margin YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Gross Profit YTD / Revenue YTD * 100), where Gross Profit = (Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold).

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Gross Profit YTD

logicalColumns.name: Gross Profit YTD
logicalColumns.description: This metric shows Gross Profit YTD = (Revenue YTD - COGS YTD).

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  -  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue

logicalColumns.name: Interest Expense to Revenue YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates the percentage of interest expenses to revenue on a YTD basis.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Interest Expense

logicalColumns.name: Income Tax Expense to Revenue YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric shows the proportion of Income Tax Expenses to Revenue on a YTD basis.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Income Tax Expense

logicalColumns.name: Investing Cash Flow
logicalColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Change in Purchases of Property, Plant and Equipment + Change in other assets. An increase will indicate that capital investments are made.

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in PPE
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Assets

logicalColumns.name: NWC to Assets
logicalColumns.description: This metric subtracts current assets from current liabilities, then divides the results into total assets to determine the ratio of networking capital to total assets.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 0 THEN ( CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  -  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END ) / %1 ELSE 0 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Assets
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Assets
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities

logicalColumns.name: Net PPE
logicalColumns.description: This metric provides value of Property, Plant and Equipment after Depreciation of the assets.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  -  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.PPE
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Accumulated Depreciation

logicalColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows : (Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Selling & Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R&D Expenditure + Other Income - Interest Expense - Taxes).

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) -  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0) +  IFNULL(%4, 0) -  IFNULL(%5, 0) -  IFNULL(%6, 0) -  IFNULL(%7, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Total Operating Expenses
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Income
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Interest Expense

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Depreciation Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Net Income Margin YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Net Income YTD / Revenue YTD * 100 Where Net Income = Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Selling and Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R and D Expenditure + Other Income - Interest - Income Taxes.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income YTD

logicalColumns.name: Net Income YTD
logicalColumns.description: Revenue (YTD) - Cost of Revenue (YTD) - Selling & Marketing Costs (YTD) - Other Operating Expenses (YTD) - R&D Expenditure (YTD) + Other Income (YTD) - Interest Expense (YTD) - Income Taxes (YTD)

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) -  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0) +  IFNULL(%4, 0) -  IFNULL(%5, 0) -  IFNULL(%6, 0) -  IFNULL(%7, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Operating Expenses
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Income
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Interest Expense

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Depreciation Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Net Income Margin %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Net Income / Revenue * 100 Where Net Income = Revenue - Cost of Revenue - Selling and Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R and D Expenditure + Other Income - Interest - Income Taxes.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE 0 END

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Operating Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Operating Cash Flow to LT Debt
logicalColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Operating Cash flow / Long Term Debt.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 0 THEN %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Debt
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Cash Flow

logicalColumns.name: Other Operating Expenses to Revenue YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Other Operating Expenses / Revenue * 100. As per design, total operating expenses are divided into sales and marketing, research and development and other operating expenses.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Operating Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Operating Margin YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Operating Profit YTD / Revenue YTD *100 Where Operating Profit = Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold - Sales and Marketing Expenses - Other Operating Expenses - Research and Development Expenditure

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Profit YTD

logicalColumns.name: Operating Profit YTD
logicalColumns.description: This metric provides profitability figures by calculating Revenue (YTD) - Cost of Goods Sold (YTD) - Selling, and Marketing Costs (YTD) - Other Operating Expenses (YTD) - R and D Expenditure (YTD)

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  -  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  -  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Operating Expenses

logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as follows: Operating Cash Flow / Current Liabilities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 0 THEN %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Cash Flow

logicalColumns.name: Operating Cash Flow
logicalColumns.description: This metric measures the current operating cash flow (YTD). Operating cash flow is the actual cash flow arising out of operations of the firm and excludes any cash changes in lieu of financing and investing activities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) +  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0) -  IFNULL(%4, 0) +  IFNULL(%5, 0) +  IFNULL(%6, 0) +  IFNULL(%7, 0) -  IFNULL(%8, 0) -  IFNULL(%9, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Depreciation Expenses
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Inventory

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Accounts Payable

logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Current Liabilities
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Prepaid Expenses
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Current Assets

logicalColumns.name: Operating Profit
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates (Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold - Selling, and Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R and D Expenditure) to provide profitability data about a firm's core business.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) -  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Total Operating Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Operating Margin %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Operating Profit / Revenue *100 Where Operating Profit = Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold - Sales and Marketing Expenses - Other Operating Expenses - Research and Development Expenditure

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Profit

logicalColumns.name: Quick Ratio
logicalColumns.description: This metric provides liquidity information by calculating (Current Assets - Inventories) / Current Liabilities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  +  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END  +  CASE  WHEN %4 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %4 END  +  CASE  WHEN %5 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %5 END  +  CASE  WHEN %6 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %6 END ) / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AR Amount
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Prepaid Expenses
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Current Assets
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Deferred Cost of Goods Sold

logicalColumns.name: Raw Material Costs to COGS YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric computes the percentage of raw materials costs compare to total cost of goods sold.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Raw Material Costs

logicalColumns.name: Raw Material Costs to Revenue %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates the percentage of raw material costs compared to total revenue.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Raw Material Costs

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE 0 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in R&D Expenses

logicalColumns.name: R&D Expense to Revenue YTD %
logicalColumns.description: The metric is computed as follows : Research and Development Expenses / Revenue * 100

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.R&D Expenses

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE 0 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Sales & Marketing Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Sales & Marketing Expense to Revenue YTD %
logicalColumns.description: The metric is computed as follows : Total Sales and Marketing Expenses YTD / Revenue YTD * 100

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Sales & Marketing Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Times Interest Earned
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates (Earnings before interest and taxes) / Interest Expense Where EBIT = Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold - Selling and Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R and D Expenditure + Other Income

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 OR %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Interest Expense
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBIT YTD

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE 0 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Total Operating Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Total Operating Expenses to Revenue YTD %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Other Operating Expenses / Revenue * 100. As per design, total operating expenses are divided into sales and marketing, research and development and other operating expenses.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Operating Expenses

logicalColumns.name: Cash Gross Margin in Analytics Currency %
logicalColumns.description: Cash Gross Margin / Cash Collections * 100; Cash Gross Margin = (Cash Collections - Cash Inputs); Where Cash Collections = Revenue - Change in Accounts Receivable Cash Inputs = Cost of Goods Sold + Change in Inventory - Change in Accounts Payable

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 - %2 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %3 / (%1 - %2) * 100.0d END

logicalColumns.name: Cash Gross Margin in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as: Cash Collections - Cash Inputs; Where Cash Collections = Revenue - Change in Accounts Receivable and Cash Inputs = Cost of Goods Sold + Change in Inventory - Change in Accounts Payable.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  -  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash Collections in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash Inputs in Analytics Currency

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Debt in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Operating Profit YTD in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric provides profitability figures by calculating Revenue (YTD) - Cost of Goods Sold (YTD) - Selling, and Marketing Costs (YTD) - Other Operating Expenses (YTD) - R and D Expenditure (YTD)

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %1 END  -  CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  -  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Operating Expenses in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Operating Cash Flow to CL in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is calculated as follows: Operating Cash Flow / Current Liabilities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 0 THEN %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Cash Flow in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Operating Cash Flow to LT Debt in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Operating Cash flow / Long Term Debt.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 <> 0 THEN %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Long Term Debt in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Cash Flow in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Operating Cash Flow in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric measures the current operating cash flow (YTD). Operating cash flow is the actual cash flow arising out of operations of the firm and excludes any cash changes in lieu of financing and investing activities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) +  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0) -  IFNULL(%4, 0) +  IFNULL(%5, 0) +  IFNULL(%6, 0) +  IFNULL(%7, 0) -  IFNULL(%8, 0) -  IFNULL(%9, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Net Income in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Depreciation Expenses in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Inventory in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Accounts Receivable in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Accounts Payable in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Accrued Liabilities in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Current Liabilities in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Prepaid Expenses in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Other Current Assets in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Operating Profit in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates (Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold - Selling, and Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R and D Expenditure) to provide profitability data about a firm's core business.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL(%1, 0) -  IFNULL(%2, 0) -  IFNULL(%3, 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Cost of Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Total Operating Expenses in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Operating Margin in Analytics Currency %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Operating Profit / Revenue *100 Where Operating Profit = Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold - Sales and Marketing Expenses - Other Operating Expenses - Research and Development Expenditure

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Operating Profit in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Quick Ratio in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric provides liquidity information by calculating (Current Assets - Inventories) / Current Liabilities.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ( CASE  WHEN %2 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 END  +  CASE  WHEN %3 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %3 END  +  CASE  WHEN %4 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %4 END  +  CASE  WHEN %5 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %5 END  +  CASE  WHEN %6 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %6 END ) / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Current Liabilities in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cash in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.AR Amount in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Prepaid Expenses in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Other Current Assets in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Deferred Cost of Goods Sold in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Raw Material Costs to COGS YTD in Analytics Currency %
logicalColumns.description: This metric computes the percentage of raw materials costs compare to total cost of goods sold.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Cost of Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Raw Material Costs in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Raw Material Costs to Revenue in Analytics Currency %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates the percentage of raw material costs compared to total revenue.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Raw Material Costs in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: R&D Expenses to Revenue in Analytics Currency %

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE 0 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in R&D Expenses in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: R&D Expense to Revenue YTD in Analytics Currency %
logicalColumns.description: The metric is computed as follows : Research and Development Expenses / Revenue * 100

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.R&D Expenses in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Sales & Marketing Expenses to Revenue in Analytics Currency %

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE 0 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Sales & Marketing Expenses in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Sales & Marketing Expense to Revenue YTD in Analytics Currency %
logicalColumns.description: The metric is computed as follows : Total Sales and Marketing Expenses YTD / Revenue YTD * 100

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Sales & Marketing Expenses in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Times Interest Earned in Analytics Currency
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates (Earnings before interest and taxes) / Interest Expense Where EBIT = Revenue - Cost of Goods Sold - Selling and Marketing Costs - Other Operating Expenses - R and D Expenditure + Other Income

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 = 0 OR %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Interest Expense in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.EBIT YTD in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Total Operating Expenses to Revenue in Analytics Currency %

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 > 0 THEN %2 / %1 * 100 ELSE 0 END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Incr (Decr) in Total Operating Expenses in Analytics Currency

logicalColumns.name: Total Operating Expenses to Revenue YTD in Analytics Currency %
logicalColumns.description: This metric calculates Other Operating Expenses / Revenue * 100. As per design, total operating expenses are divided into sales and marketing, research and development and other operating expenses.

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN %1 IS NULL  THEN 0 WHEN %1 <= 0 THEN 0 ELSE %2 / %1 * 100.0d END
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Revenue in Analytics Currency
logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - GL Balance.Total Operating Expenses in Analytics Currency
